*[[Yellow Flute#Shops|Fallarbor Town Gem Master]] }} == Description == The '''Yellow Flute''' is a type of [[Flutes|Flute]]. By using Grass, Flying, and Electric Gems the Yellow Flute increases the player's Pokemon Attack. == Details == Yellow Flute increases the player's Pokemon Attack by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 18%, with an achievement bonus of 800%. Costs a variable amount of Grass, Flying, and Electric Gems when active, cost based on how many total Flutes are active. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/headâ€Ž|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Fallarbor_Town_Gem_Master|Fallarbor Town Gem Master]]| 5,000 [[File:Grass_Gem.png|30px]]
5,000 [[File:Flying_Gem.png|30px]]
5,000 [[File:Electric_Gem.png|30px]]}} |} |} __NOTOC__ {{Battle items}}
